g.text: Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the one he wants update a product.
Selects the Pharmacy he wants update a product.
Shows to the Administrator a list of products and asks him to choose the one he wants update.
Selects the product he wants update.
Asks for the necessary product's data (Name, Description, Price, Weight, Amount).
Displays the data, requesting confirmation to update the product.
Informs about the success of the operation
